         });

class="lang-en">Travel Guide &amp; Tips</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«¬Ó«»Ó«ú Ó«ÁÓ«┤Ó«┐Ó«òÓ«¥Ó«ƒÓ»ìÓ«ƒÓ«┐ &amp; Ó«òÓ»üÓ«▒Ó«┐Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»üÓ«òÓ«│Ó»ì</span> </h2> <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">  <div> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-landmark text-orange-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">History &amp; Significance</span> <span Nataraja Temple represents the Sky element (Akasha Lingam). It is famous for the &#39;Chidambara Rahasiyam&#39; and the cosmic dance of Lord Shiva.</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Chidambaram Thillai Nataraja Temple represents the Sky element (Akasha Lingam). Tips</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«¬Ó«»Ó«ú Ó«ÁÓ«┤Ó«┐Ó«òÓ«¥Ó«ƒÓ»ìÓ«ƒÓ«┐ &amp; Ó«òÓ»üÓ«▒Ó«┐Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»üÓ«òÓ«│Ó»ì</span> </h2> <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">  <div> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-landmark text-orange-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">History &amp; Significance</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«ÁÓ«░Ó«▓Ó«¥Ó«▒Ó»ü &amp; Ó«ÜÓ«┐Ó«▒Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»ü</span> </h3> <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm leading-relaxed whitespace-pre-line"> <span class="lang-en">Mahabalipuram (Mamallapuram) was a bustling seaport of the Pallava kings in the 7th century. class="text-gray-600 text-sm leading-relaxed whitespace-pre-line"> <span class="lang-en">The Navagraha temples are a cluster of 9 temples dedicated to the nine planetary deities. -->  <!-- Excludes -->  </div> <!-- Travel Guide / Service Info Section --> <div class="p-6 md:p-8 border-t border-gray-100 bg-orange-50/30"> <h2 class="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-book-open text-orange-600"></i> <span class="lang-en">Travel Guide &amp; Tips</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«¬Ó«»Ó«ú Ó«ÁÓ«┤Ó«┐Ó«òÓ«¥Ó«ƒÓ»ìÓ«ƒÓ«┐ &amp; Ó«òÓ»üÓ«▒Ó«┐Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»üÓ«òÓ«│Ó»ì</span> </h2> <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">  <div> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-landmark text-orange-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">History &amp; Significance</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«ÁÓ«░Ó«▓Ó«¥Ó«▒Ó»ü &amp; Ó«ÜÓ«┐Ó«▒Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»ü</span> </h3> <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm leading-relaxed whitespace-pre-line"> <span class="lang-en">Rameswaram is one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites. It is where Lord Rama built a bridge (Ram Setu) to Lanka. The Ramanathaswamy Temple is famous for its long corridors and 22 sacred wells (Theerthams).</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Rameswaram is one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites. It is where Lord Rama built a bridge (Ram Setu) to Lanka. The Ramanathaswamy Temple is famous for its long corridors and 22 sacred wells (Theerthams).</span> </p> </div>  <div class="space-y-6"> <div> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-clock text-orange-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">Darshan Timings</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«ñÓ«░Ó«┐Ó«ÜÓ«® Ó«¿Ó»çÓ«░Ó«ÖÓ»ìÓ«òÓ«│Ó»ì</span> </h3> <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm whitespace-pre-line"> <span class="lang-en">5:00 AM ÔÇô 1:00 PM &amp; 3:00 PM ÔÇô 9:00 PM</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">5:00 AM ÔÇô 1:00 PM &amp; 3:00 PM ÔÇô 9:00 PM</span> </p> </div> <div> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-user-tie text-orange-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">Dress Code</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó«åÓ«ƒÓ»ê Ó«òÓ«ƒÓ»ìÓ«ƒÓ»üÓ«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó«¥Ó«ƒÓ»ü</span> </h3> <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm"> <span class="lang-en">Traditional wear. Wet clothes are allowed after Theertham bath.</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Traditional wear. Wet clothes are allowed after Theertham bath.</span> </p> </div> </div> </div>  <div class="mt-8 bg-white rounded-lg p-5 border shadow-sm border-orange-100"> <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 mb-3 flex items-center gap-2"> <i class="fa-solid fa-lightbulb text-yellow-500"></i> <span class="lang-en">Pro Tips for First-Timers</span> <span class="lang-ta hidden">Ó««Ó»üÓ«òÓ»ìÓ«òÓ«┐Ó«» Ó«òÓ»üÓ«▒Ó«┐Ó«¬Ó»ìÓ«¬Ó»üÓ«òÓ«│Ó»ì</span> </h3> <ul class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-3 lang-en"> <li class="flex items-start gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600"> <i class="fa-solid fa-check mt-1 text-green-500"></i> <span>Start with Agni Theertham (Sea Bath) first.</span> </li><li class="flex items-start gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600"> <i class="fa-solid fa-check mt-1 text-green-500"></i> <span>Proceed to 22 Wells Bath inside the temple (Ticket required).</span> </li><li class="flex items-start gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600"> <i class="fa-solid fa-check mt-1 text-green-500"></i>
